nodes.text: Missing the Mannett Point: The Mantellian Civil War Revealed

"Missing the Mannett Point: The Mantellian Civil War Revealed" was a holobook documentary by holojournalist Lamalla Rann about the Separatist War, a civil war that embroiled the planet Ord Mantell in the year 3643 BBY. Rann's documentary became the best-selling non-fiction work of the year.
